node.title: Two arrested after aggravated robbery at Christchurch shop
node.description: Police have arrested two men after an aggravated robbery at a Christchurch shop last month.
node.content:
["Police have arrested two men after an aggravated robbery at a Christchurch shop last month.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Richard Tindiller\n
", "Police said three people were involved in the incident at the Growers Direct Market on Yaldhurst Road in Riccarton on 23 January.", "The two men, who were arrested yesterday, will appear in court today on charges relating to assault with intent to rob.", "Police are still looking for the third person."]
